reviews.review: If you're not familiar with the comic books or at least watched all 18 MCU movies you might be confused maybe even disappointed. The previous movies worked on building up to this point. This movie does a great job balancing the characters and storyline. funny, sad, and action packed.

best movie of mcu thanos is more power full villen but some clips missing showing in trailer
best movie

I was so happy with this movie. The Empire Strikes Back of this Generation. So genuinely good. I have watched all of the Marvel films and read some of the comics and can safely say I was more than pleased with this movie, with this experience. Do yourself a favor and go see this movie. My new favorite Marvel Movie (I loved Winter Soldier, but it is 2nd place in my heart after seeing this)

A great but not imperfect finale to the first MCU story arc this film hits hard in everything it tries to accomplish while often being a  cluster (you know what) it yearns also to stay grounded which can be appreciated.With a truly interesting relationship driven story arc to (Josh Brolin's) C.G.I. Finished Thanos it gives something new to a specifically new marvel villain you dont see in others with of course the unrealistic higher calling and god complex, illogical, disillusions.Which seems to be the only appropriate antagonist for these avengers films.However this movie seems to thrive solely off of character interactions plot purpose and mcguffin conveniences at times leaving it to fall flat in protagonist motivation other than the copy and paste "we have to save the world".But solely what keeps this film from falling below in quality is its every accomplishment in a congruent story assembled by cast performances character ability which isnt a new avengers formula but that being said what infinity war does what age of ultron cared not t.That's largely due to character development and improvement or critical decline which were the deciding factors in this film.This movie is a 8.8/10 or 4.6/5 or an 89/100
Wonderful movie.  Never checked my watch once to see where I was in the movie.  Love the continuation  and drawing together of the plot between all the Marvel movies.
Infinity War is everything we have been waiting for and more. Thanos is great and that ending is amazing
Great movie, just sooooooo much action and possibly one of the best cliffhangers ever. Congrats Marvel now I can't wait for Captain Marvel and Avengers 4

This movie was completely amazing! The movie sets up perfectly for part 2 and I canâ€™t wait! If you are a big fan of the marvel universe then u may be in tears (as I was) at the very end! Great movie definitely going to see it again!

This film was absolute genius. It's so densely packed and so unflinchingly focused, the russo brothers did a fantastic job. you're going to have to watch it 2-3 times though, just to take in all of it. brilliant, brilliant film. can't wait for the next one.

For a lot of funny scenes, too many heroes who could all fight against Thanos. In addition, Thanos had a light problem with them.I thought Thanos loss but not this is okey but great villain is villain who you cant nevet hit 2/10
